thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Changes to global supply chains would be "quite important" for Norway fund-CEO

title: Changes to global supply chains would be "quite important" for Norway fund-CEO
text:
April 27, 2018 / 8:32 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago Changes to global supply chains would be "quite important" for Norway fund-CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
OSLO, April 27 (Reuters) - The CEO of Norway’s $1 trillion sovereign wealth fund said on Friday that any changes to global supply chains would be quite important for the fund.
“Any change to global supply chain will be quite important for this fund,” Yngve Slyngstad told reporters after presenting the fund’s first-quarter earnings.
The fund invests in over 9,000 companies, including most of the world’s multinational companies. (Reporting by Gwladys Fouche, editing by Terje Solsvik)
